name: Pip's Plant Planet Pursuit
description:
Our brave explorer Pip is on the hunt for berries he uses to make homemade jelly donuts. But strange gravity and pesky thorns stand in his way... Thankfully he has Gravity Boots that help keep him grounded!

Controls

  • Spacebar to use gravity boots
  • Arrow Keys to move left/right

Made in a few hours for the 100 Lines GameMaker Jam.
